page.title: 17APPLIANCES IN USE IN CORBY.
page.content: The results of the electrical appliance survey confirm the hypothesis that a wide range of electrical appliances are regularly in home use in the year 1985. In the kitchen, 68% of the sample had a food mixer, 61% a sandwich maker, 16% a microwave cooker, 80% a deepfreeze, 100% a washing machine, 60% a tumble drier and 98% a refrigerator. In 1985, people have more leisure time available to them and interesting statistics relating to leisure-based appliances are: computers 76%, videos 58%, Hi-Fi systems 88%, colour T.V.Â£s 95%. Interesting miscellaneous items were: hair-drier 86%, telephone 78%, electric lawn mowers 78%, air filters 10% and electric drills 76%.
